channel.title: Lectures on 3K: Dynamics and Heterogeneity
channel.description: Recent content in Lectures on 3K: Dynamics and Heterogeneity

item.title: Lecture 1, Reviewing Linear Models
item.description: Lecture 1: A Review of Linear Models RWW Lab: Summarise one or more Time Series XT summaries and one or multiple line plots.

item.title: Lecture 2, ARMA and Stationarity
item.description: Lecture 3: Stationarity and Univariate Models RWW Lab: ARIMA on the Falklands

item.title: Lecture 3, Dynamic Models
item.description: Lecture 3: Dynamic Regression Models RWW Lab: Catch Up with a simulator and some ARIMA

item.title: Lecture 4, Cointegration
item.description: Lecture 4: Models of Equilibration RWW Harold joins us to discuss his work in this.
